named-query.name: Cidade.contem
named-query.query: select c from Cidade c where c.nome like concat('%', :nome, '%') order by c.nome asc

named-query.name: Cidade.pesquisarPor
named-query.query: select c from Cidade c where c.nome = :nome

named-query.name: Cidade.pesquisarTodos
named-query.query: select c from Cidade c order by c.nome

named-query.name: Restaurante.contem
named-query.query: select r from Restaurante r where r.nome like concat('%', :nome, '%') order by r.nome asc

named-query.name: Restaurante.pesquisarPor
named-query.query: select r from Restaurante r where r.nome = :nome

named-query.name: Restaurante.pesquisarTodos
named-query.query: select DISTINCT(r) from Restaurante r left outer join r.servicoEntregas left join fetch r.endereco.cidade order by r.nome

named-query.name: ServicoEntrega.contem
named-query.query: select se from ServicoEntrega se where se.nome like concat('%', :nome, '%') order by se.nome asc

named-query.name: ServicoEntrega.pesquisarPor
named-query.query: select se from ServicoEntrega se where se.nome = :nome

named-query.name: ServicoEntrega.pesquisarTodos
named-query.query: select se from ServicoEntrega se order by se.nome
